title: Mobile App Developer
jobDescription:
SIB Infotech is looking for Mobile App Developer to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  • Design and build advanced applications for the Android platform
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features
  • Work with outside data sources and APIsUnit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability
  • Work on bug fixing and improving application performance
  • Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency
  • Conceptualizing and formulating apps that are suitable for use on all types of Android devices
  • Implementing measures to safeguard users data

title: Mobile Application Developer
jobDescription:
A sound experience and background in Mobile application development. Experience working with remote data via REST, JSON, Android SDK, MySQL, MS SQL, and RDBMS. In-depth understanding of Android libraries available to developers as well as with third-party libraries.

Good knowledge of the network layer on Android. Understand testing methods and app release process.

Work on bug fixing and improving application performance. Have published at least one original Android app.

Good understanding of Android fundamentals - end-to-end app development and creating custom components. Should be able to handle the complete app development lifecycle independently.

Strong communication skills and ability to work within a team to achieve set targets and deadlines.

title: Sr . Mobile Application Developer
tagsAndSkills: gps tracking,android application,Mobile development,Sales,Web technologies,Manager Technology,E-commerce,application architecture
jobDescription:
1. Independently design & Build entire FemaleAdda Web platform into Mobile Platform

2. Build advance application for products booking/sales, Social Chat, Third Party API integration, GPS tracking system , Payment gateway etc

3. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features for us

4. Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.

Desirable

1. BE/Btech/MCA ( 3 years+ experience ) with sound track records in previous companies in the same field.

2. Must have minimum 5 apps published and running well.

3. Working knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies

4. Solid understanding of the full mobile development life cycle and have innovative thinking.

5. Good Communication skill and well understanding of present IT market and technology environments.

6. Must have well understanding of E-commerce company and Shopping site Projects and its application architecture and platform.

7. Timely delivery of Projects and fast work desirable in candidate.
